h7101.definition: from {{h7096}} in the sense of determining; a magistrate (as deciding) or other leader; captain, guide, prince, ruler. Compare {{h6278}}.

h7102.definition: from {{h7106}}; cassia (as peeled; plural the bark); cassia.

h7103.definition: the same as {{h7102}}; Ketsiah, a daughter of Job; Kezia.

h7104.definition: from {{h7112}}; abrupt; Keziz, a valley in Palestine; Keziz.

h7105.definition: from {{h7114}}; severed, i.e. harvest (as reaped), the crop, the time, the reaper, or figuratively; also a limb (of a tree, or simply foliage); bough, branch, harvest (man).

h7106.definition: a primitive root; to strip off, i.e. (partially) scrape; by implication, to segregate (as an angle); cause to scrape, corner.

h7107.definition: a primitive root; to crack off, i.e. (figuratively) burst out in rage; (be) anger(-ry), displease, fret self, (provoke to) wrath (come), be wroth.

h7108.definition: (Aramaic) corresponding to {{h7107}}; to become enraged; be furious.

h7110.definition: from {{h7107}}; a splinter (as chipped off); figuratively, rage or strife; foam, indignation, × sore, wrath.

h7112.definition: a primitive root; to chop off (literally or figuratively); cut (asunder, in pieces, in sunder, off), × utmost.

h7114.definition: a primitive root; to dock off, i.e. curtail (transitive or intransitive, literal or figurative); especially to harvest (grass or grain); × at all, cut down, much discouraged, grieve, harvestman, lothe, mourn, reap(-er), (be, wax) short(-en, -er), straiten, trouble, vex.

h7115.definition: from {{h7114}}; shortness (of spirit), i.e. impatience; anguish.

h7116.definition: from {{h7114}}; short (whether in size, number, life, strength or temper); few, hasty, small, soon.

h7117.definition: from {{h7096}}; a termination (literally or figuratively); also (by implication) a portion; adverbially (with prepositional prefix) after; end, part, × some.

h7119.definition: contracted from an unused root meaning to chill; cool; figuratively, quiet; cold, excellent (from the margin).

h7120.definition: from the same as {{h7119}}; cold; cold.

h7121.definition: a primitive root (rather identical with {{h7122}} through the idea of accosting a person met); to call out to (i.e. properly, address by name, but used in a wide variety of applications); bewray (self), that are bidden, call (for, forth, self, upon), cry (unto), (be) famous, guest, invite, mention, (give) name, preach, (make) proclaim(-ation), pronounce, publish, read, renowned, say.

h7122.definition: a primitive root; to encounter, whether accidentally or in a hostile manner; befall, (by) chance, (cause to) come (upon), fall out, happen, meet.

h7124.definition: properly, active participle of {{h7121}}; a caller, i.e. partridge (from its cry); partridge. See also {{h6981}}.

h7125.definition: from {{h7122}}; an encountering, accidental, friendly or hostile (also adverbially, opposite); × against (he come), help, meet, seek, × to, × in the way.

h7126.definition: a primitive root; to approach (causatively, bring near) for whatever purpose; (cause to) approach, (cause to) bring (forth, near), (cause to) come (near, nigh), (cause to) draw near (nigh), go (near), be at hand, join, be near, offer, present, produce, make ready, stand, take.

h7127.definition: (Aramaic) corresponding to {{h7126}}; approach, come (near, nigh), draw near.

h7130.definition: from {{h7126}}; properly, the nearest part, i.e. the center, whether literal, figurative or adverbial (especially with preposition); × among, × before, bowels, × unto charge,   eat (up), × heart, × him, × in, inward (× -ly, part, -s, thought), midst,   out of, purtenance, × therein, × through, × within self.

h7131.definition: from {{h7126}}; near; approach, come (near, nigh), draw near.

h7133.definition: or קֻרְבָּן; from {{h7126}}; something brought near the altar, i.e. a sacrificial present; oblation, that is offered, offering.

h7134.definition: perhaps from {{h6923}} in the sense of striking upon; an axe; ax.

h7136.definition: a primitive root; to light upon (chiefly by accident); causatively, to bring about; specifically, to impose timbers (for roof or floor); appoint, lay (make) beams, befall, bring, come (to pass unto), floor, (hap) was, happen (unto), meet, send good speed.

h7137.definition: from {{h7136}}; an (unfortunate) occurrence, i.e. some accidental (ceremonial) disqualification; uncleanness that chanceth.

h7138.definition: or קָרֹב; from {{h7126}}; near (in place, kindred or time); allied, approach, at hand,   any of kin, kinsfold(-sman), (that is) near (of kin), neighbour, (that is) next, (them that come) nigh (at hand), more ready, short(-ly).

h7139.definition: a primitive root; to depilate; make (self) bald.

h7140.definition: or קֹרַח; from {{h7139}}; ice (as if bald, i.e. smooth); hence, hail; by resemblance, rock crystal; crystal, frost, ice.

h7141.definition: from {{h7139}}; ice; Korach, the name of two Edomites and three Israelites; Korah.

h7142.definition: from {{h7139}}; bald (on the back of the head); bald (head).

h7143.definition: from {{h7139}}; bald; Kareach, an Israelite; Careah, Kareah.

h7144.definition: or קׇרְחָא; (Ezekiel 27:31), from {{h7139}}; baldness; bald(-ness), × utterly.

h7145.definition: patronymic from {{h7141}}; a Korchite (collectively) or descendants of Korach; Korahite, Korathite, sons of Kore, Korhite.

h7146.definition: from {{h7139}}; a bald spot (on the back of the head); figuratively, a threadbare spot (on the back side of the cloth); bald head, bare within.

h7148.definition: from {{h7121}}; called, i.e. select; famous, renowned.

h7151.definition: from {{h7136}} in the sense of flooring, i.e. building; a city; city.

h7152.definition: plural of {{h7151}}; buildings; Kerioth, the name of two places in Palestine; Kerioth, Kirioth.

h7153.definition: or (with the article interposed) קִרְיַת הָאַרְבַּע; (Nehemiah 11:25), from {{h7151}} and {{h704}} or {{h702}}; city of Arba, or city of the four (giants); Kirjath-Arba or Kirjath-ha-Arba, a place in Palestine; Kirjath-arba.

h7154.definition: from {{h7151}} and {{h1168}}; city of Baal; Kirjath-Baal, a place in Palestine; Kirjathbaal.

h7155.definition: from {{h7151}} and the feminine plural of {{h2351}}; city of streets; Kirjath-Chutsoth, a place in Moab; Kirjath-huzoth.

h7156.definition: dual of {{h7151}}; double city; Kirjathaim, the name of two placed in Palestine; Kiriathaim, Kirjathaim.

h7157.definition: or (Jeremiah 26:20) with the article interposed; or (Joshua 18:28) simply the former part of the word; or קִרְיַת עָרִים; from {{h7151}} and the plural of {{h3293}} or {{h5892}}; city of forests, or city of towns; Kirjath-Jearim or Kirjath-Arim, a place in Palestine; Kirjath, Kirjath-jearim, Kirjath-arim.

h7158.definition: or קִרְיַת סֵפֶר; from {{h7151}} and a simpler feminine from the same as {{h5577}}, or (for the latter name) {{h5612}}; city of branches, or of a book; Kirjath-Sannah or Kirjath-Sepher, a place in Palestine; Kirjath-sannah, Kirjath-sepher.

h7159.definition: a primitive root; to cover; cover.

h7160.definition: a primitive root; to push or gore; used only as denominative from {{h7161}},; to shoot out horns; figuratively, rays; have horns, shine.

h7161.definition: from {{h7160}}; a horn (as projecting); by implication, a flask, cornet; by resemblance. an elephant's tooth (i.e. ivory), a corner (of the altar), a peak (of a mountain), a ray (of light); figuratively, power; × hill, horn.

h7162.definition: (Aramaic) corresponding to {{h7161}}; a horn (literally or for sound); horn, cornet.

h7163.definition: from {{h7161}} and {{h6320}}; horn of cosmetic; Keren-hap-Puk, one of Job's daughters; Keren-happuch.

h7164.definition: a primitive root; properly, to protrude; used only as denominative from {{h7165}} (for alliteration with {{h7167}}),; to hunch, i.e. be hump-backed; stoop.

h7165.definition: from {{h7164}}; a knob or belaying-pin (from its swelling form); tache.

h7166.definition: from {{h7164}}; an ankle (as a protuberance or joint); foot.

h7167.definition: a primitive root; to rend, literally or figuratively (revile, paint the eyes, as if enlarging them); cut out, rend, × surely, tear.

h7169.definition: a primitive root; to pinch, i.e. (partially) to bite the lips, blink the eyes (as a gesture of malice), or (fully) to squeeze off (a piece of clay in order to mould a vessel from it); form, move, wink.

h7170.definition: (Aramaic) corresponding to {{h7171}} in the sense of a bit (to 'eat the morsels of' any one, i.e.; chew him up (figuratively) by slander; accuse.

h7171.definition: from {{h7169}}; extirpation (as if by constriction); destruction.

h7172.definition: from {{h7167}}; floor (as if a pavement of pieces or tesseræ), of a building or the sea; bottom, (× one side of the) floor.

h7173.definition: the same as {{h7172}}; ground-floor; Karka (with the article prefix), a place in Palestine; Karkaa.

h7174.definition: from {{h6979}}; foundation; Karkor, a place East of the Jordan; Karkor.

h7175.definition: from an unused root meaning to split off; a slab or plank; by implication, a deck of a ship; bench, board.

h7176.definition: from {{h7136}} in the sense of building; a city; city.

h7177.definition: from {{h7176}}; city; Kartah, a place in Palestine; Kartah.

h7178.definition: from {{h7176}}; city-plot; Kartan, a place in Palestine; Kartan.

h7180.definition: from an unused root (meaning to be hard); a cucumber (from the difficulty of digestion); cucumber.

h7181.definition: a primitive root; to prick up the ears, i.e. hearken; attend, (cause to) hear(-ken), give heed, incline, mark (well), regard.

h7182.definition: from {{h7181}}; a hearkening; × diligently, hearing, much heed, that regarded.

h7184.definition: or קַשְׂוָה; from an unused root meaning to be round; a jug (from its shape); cover, cup.

h7185.definition: a primitive root; properly, to be dense, i.e. tough or severe (in various applications); be cruel, be fiercer, make grievous, be ((ask a), be in, have, seem, would) hard(-en, (labour), -ly, thing), be sore, (be, make) stiff(-en, (-necked)).

h7186.definition: from {{h7185}}; severe (in various applications); churlish, cruel, grievous, hard((-hearted), thing), heavy,   impudent, obstinate, prevailed, rough(-ly), sore, sorrowful, stiff(necked), stubborn,   in trouble.

h7187.definition: (Aramaic) or קשֹׁט; (Aramaic), corresponding to {{h7189}}; fidelity; truth.

h7188.definition: a primitive root; to be (causatively, make) unfeeling; harden.

h7189.definition: or קֹשְׁטְ; from an unused root meaning to balance; equity (as evenly weighed), i.e. reality; truth.

h7191.definition: from {{h7190}}; hard ground; Kishjon, a place in Palestine; Kishion, Keshon.

h7192.definition: from an unused root (probably meaning to weigh out); an ingot (as definitely estimated and stamped for a coin); piece of money (silver).

h7193.definition: by reduplication from an unused root meaning to shale off as bark; a scale (of a fish); hence a coat of mail (as composed of or covered with jointed plates of metal); mail, scale.

h7194.definition: a primitive root; to tie, physically (gird, confine, compact) or mentally (in love, league); bind (up), (make a) conspire(-acy, -ator), join together, knit, stronger, work (treason).

h7195.definition: from {{h7194}}; an (unlawful) alliance; confederacy, conspiracy, treason.

h7196.definition: from {{h7194}}; an (ornamental) girdle (for women); attire, headband.

h7197.definition: a primitive root; to become sapless through drought; used only as denominative from {{h7179}}; to forage for straw, stubble or wood; figuratively, to assemble; gather (selves) (together).

h7198.definition: from {{h7185}} in the original sense (of {{h6983}}) of bending; a bow, for shooting (hence, figuratively, strength) or the iris; × arch(-er),   arrow, bow(-man, -shot).

h7199.definition: intensive (as denominative) from {{h7198}}; a bowman; × archer.

h7200.definition: a primitive root; to see, literally or figuratively (in numerous applications, direct and implied, transitive, intransitive and causative); advise self, appear, approve, behold, × certainly, consider, discern, (make to) enjoy, have experience, gaze, take heed, × indeed, × joyfully, lo, look (on, one another, one on another, one upon another, out, up, upon), mark, meet, × be near, perceive, present, provide, regard, (have) respect, (fore-, cause to, let) see(-r, -m, one another), shew (self), × sight of others, (e-) spy, stare, × surely, × think, view, visions.
